title: Donny Phillips from KHIL Studios and The Warriors
itunes:title: Donny Phillips from KHIL Studios and The Warriors
description:
Merry Christmas! We have a rad chat with designer Donny Phillips this week about playing in the band The Warriors, his design work with HUGE artists like Eminem and many others and finally, what it’s like to grow up with a twin brother in the high deserts of California. DO IT UP! Get 15% off by using the code PC100WORDSORLESS. Visit Rockabillia.com and find it ALL! Want a better night sleep? Try a Casper for 100 days and your life will change. DO IT UP Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show! Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy.
